

Bisection
┏━━━━━━━━━━━┳━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━┳━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━┳━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━┳━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━┓

Newton's Method
┏━━━━━━━━━━━┳━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━┳━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━┳━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━┳━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━┓

Secant Method

Fixed Point Method

Steffensen's Method
┏━━━━━━━━━━━┳━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━┳━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━┳━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━┳━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━┓
┃ Iteration ┃                         x ┃                      f(x) ┃            Absolute Error ┃            Relative Error ┃ 
┣━━━━━━━━━━━╋━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━╋━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━╋━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━╋━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━┫
┃         0 ┃                       1.5 ┃                    -1.375 ┃         0.339286755214161 ┃        0.1844664809618854 ┃ 
┃         1 ┃         1.840915836140294 ┃      0.008923643317700902 ┃      0.001629080926132564 ┃     0.0008857134003245075 ┃
